project_description: Built a feature-rich eCommerce site using ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, Redux, Strapi, and Stripe. Implemented search, cart, wishlist, authentication, and secure payments. Ensured a responsive UI and optimized state management with Redux.

Built a Trello-like project management app using ReactJS, Next.js, TypeScript, Zustand, Tailwind CSS, Clerk, Prisma, and Supabase. Features include organizations, boards, lists, tasks, drag-and-drop, and authentication. Ensured a real-time, responsive UI with optimized state management.
